text:
With 30 days after the receipt of the request required by the preceding Section, the Director of Property shall prepare a report for the Mayor and the requesting department of the estimated fair market value of the Real Property, the character of the improvements thereon and an evaluation as to whether, in the opinion of the Director of Property, the Real Property can be advantageously used by the requesting department for the purposes specified in the request. 
(Formerly Sec. 23.11; added by Ord. No. 7919 (1939), Sec. 3; amended and renumbered by Ord. 15-01, File No. 001965, App. 2/2/2001. Former Sec. 23.14 was renumbered as 23.17 by Ord. 15-01.)
